attributes.action: eradicate all shadow copy errors from Visual Studio 2005
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to fix the bug within the Microsoft Visual Studio development environment, relating to shadow copy errors when a project is built and then run.

The error infringes upon the basic human rights of IT workers across the globe.

The resulting error is in the following format:

"Exception Details: System.IO.FileLoadException: Cannot create/shadow copy '*.dll' when that file already exists"

The indicated dll can differ.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
